description:
This schema shows some possibilities on how to customize the displaying of items using the summary pattern:

 - **Markdown** to apply formatting

 - **ICU** for general message formatting and simple logic [ICU documentation](https://unicode-org.github.io/icu/userguide/format_parse/messages/ "Visit the External ICU Documentation")

 - **Pipes** to transform values. Checkout [SummaryPatternPipes#CORE_PIPE_FACTORIES](https://bitbucket.lab.dynatrace.org/projects/RX/repos/configuration-core/browse/core-client-shared/src/main/java/com/dynatrace/configuration/core/client/shared/util/SummaryPatternPipes.java) (for general pipes) and [MonitoringSettingsFactory#createPipeRegistry](https://bitbucket.lab.dynatrace.org/projects/RX/repos/cluster/browse/shared/settings.monitoring.impl/src/main/java/com/dynatrace/settings/monitoring/impl/internalapi/MonitoringSettingsFactory.java) (for cluster-side and custom pipes) to see what pipes are registered and available for usage.

icu_number_formatting.description: This summary makes use of some of ICU's number formatting capabilities

icu_plural.description: This summary makes use of ICU's `plural` to display some text depending on an integer value

icu_select.description: This summary makes use of ICU's `select` to display some text depending on a boolean flag

non_empty_text.description: This summary shows how to use pipes, in particular the `valueSet` pipe to check if a value is set

truncated.description: This summary shows how to use pipes, in particular the `truncate` pipe to limit the length of the displayed text to 10 characters

truncatedCollection.description: This summary shows how to use pipes, in particular the `truncateCollection` pipe to limit the size of the collection to 3 elements and the length of each text item in it to 4 characters

IcuNumberFormattingItem.summaryPattern: default: {integerProperty}, number: {integerProperty, number}, group-off: {integerProperty, number, :: group-off}, scientific: {integerProperty, number, :: scientific/*ee}

IcuPluralItem.summaryPattern: You entered **{integerProperty, plural, =0 {none!} one {just one.} =2 {exactly two.} other {a lot!}}**

IcuSelectItem.summaryPattern: Am I set? **{booleanProperty, select, true {Yes, I am!} other {No, I am not...}}**

NonEmptyTextItem.summaryPattern: You entered: **{textProperty | valueSet, select, true {{textProperty}} other {Nothing!}}**

TruncatedCollection.summaryPattern: Truncated to 3 elements with max 4 characters length: {collProperty | truncateCollection:'3' : '4'}
